original_text:
China River
La slot gratis China River dello sviluppatore Bally presenta un design molto minimale e naturalistico, con dettagli che richiamano la tradizione cinese. Non perdere il prezioso simbolo dell’Uccellino Azzurro della felicità e prova a catturarlo! I simboli misteriosi e la musica che suona mentre i rulli sono in movimento rendono le partite piacevoli e con buone probabilità di vincita. Leggi la mia recensione e prova la versione gratuita nei nostri casinò online.
Quali sono gli elementi distintivi di questo gameplay?
La slot senza scaricare China River di Bally presenta un gameplay molto minimale con uno sfondo che ci mostra foglie e fiori. Con 5 rulli, 4 file e 30 linee di pagamento puoi cominciare a realizzare le tue vincite! Puoi scommettere in questo gioco da 1 centesimo fino ad 1 Euro. Premi il pulsante SPIN e vedi cosa ha in serbo per te il destino. Per quanto riguarda l’RTP, il gioco ripaga del 95,87%, il che è accettabile, ma ricorda che il 2% verrà dai Jackpot progressivi, quindi China River non fa tutto da solo!
Simbologia tutta da scoprire…

I simboli più bassi sono i sei Reali
I simboli che pagano di più sono: una Rana, una Ciotola d’Oro, un Fiore di Loto e un ridicolo Personaggio Cinese tutto agghindato d’oro. Se ne ottieni 5 il gioco ti ricompenserà con 33.33 volte la puntata
Il simbolo dell’Uccello Giallo è il Wild. Può atterrare sui rulli 2, 3, 4 e 5 e sostituire qualsiasi simbolo di pagamento. Quando lo fa, partirà una bella animazione che rappresenta una barca su un fiume ricoperta da una pioggia di fiori
I simboli delle Monete colorate in oro e rosso sono gli Scatter. Se ne atterrano 3 a 5 sui rulli, ti daranno da 8 a 15 giri gratuiti, oltre a un premio fino a 100 volte la puntata.

Quali sono i 3 Jackpot di China River?
Questa slot senza scaricare ha 3 jackpot progressivi che devono essere vinti prima che raggiungano livelli prestabiliti di 1.500, 20.000 o 200.000 crediti. Essi sono:

Minor,
Major
Epic.

Non si può dire con certezza quando saranno vinti, il processo avviene in modo casuale e in qualsiasi momento. Quando un Jackpot è stato vinto, viene ripristinato a un importo iniziale di circa il 25% dell’importo pagato. Il 2% di ogni scommessa viene utilizzato per alimentare i tre Jackpot e il processo riparte.
In cosa consiste la funzionalità Mystery Stacked Reels?
Ogni bobina contiene posizioni di simboli misteriosi in pila che vengono sostituite con uno dei due o tre simboli scelti casualmente quando viene avviato il lancio. Tutte le posizioni dei simboli misteriosi su ogni singola bobina vengono sostituite con la stessa icona per giro tranne quello Jolly.
Le mie conclusioni finali
Come tutte le migliori slot Bally, China River è disponibile sia per giocare con soldi veri che per partite in modalità demo senza alcun deposito. Troverai il titolo all’interno dei nostri casinò e con l’occasione, potrai dare uno sguardo agli altri giochi a tema asiatico oppure optare per l’affascinante mondo dell’Antico Egitto!

raw_translation.response:
China River

The free slot game China River by developer Bally features a very minimalistic and naturalistic design, with details reminiscent of Chinese tradition. Don't miss the precious symbol of the Blue Bird of Happiness and try to catch it! The mysterious symbols and music playing while the reels are in motion make for enjoyable games with good chances of winning. Read my review and try the free version at our online casinos.

What are the distinctive elements of this gameplay?

Bally's China River no-download slot features minimal gameplay with a background that shows leaves and flowers. With 5 reels, 4 rows, and 30 paylines, you can start winning! You can bet in this game from 1 cent up to 1 Euro. Press the SPIN button and see what fate has in store for you. As for the RTP, the game pays out 95.87%, which is acceptable, but remember that 2% will come from the Progressive Jackpots, so China River doesn't do it all by itself!

Symbols to discover...

The lowest symbols are the six Royals.
The highest paying symbols are: a Frog, a Gold Bowl, a Lotus Flower, and a ridiculous Chinese Character all dressed in gold. If you get 5, the game will reward you with 33.33 times your bet.
The symbol of the Yellow Bird is the Wild. It can land on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5 and replace any paying symbol. When it does, a beautiful animation depicting a boat on a river covered with a rain of flowers will start.
The symbols of the colored Coins in gold and red are the Scatters. If 3 to 5 land on the reels, they will give you from 8 to 15 free spins, plus a prize of up to 100 times your bet.

What are China River's 3 Jackpots?

This no-download slot has 3 progressive jackpots that must be won before they reach preset levels of 1,500, 20,000, or 200,000 credits. They are:

Minor,
Major
Epic.

It cannot be said for certain when they will be won, the process happens randomly and at any time. When a Jackpot is won, it is reset to an initial amount of about 25% of the amount paid. 2% of each bet is used to feed the three Jackpots and the process starts over.

What is the Mystery Stacked Reels feature?

Each reel contains positions of mystery symbols stacked that are replaced with one of two or three randomly chosen symbols when the spin is initiated. All mystery symbol positions on each individual reel are replaced by the same icon per spin except for the Wild.

My final conclusions

Like all the best Bally slots, China River is available to play for real money or in demo mode without any deposit. You will find the title in our casinos and on the occasion, you can take a look at other Asian-themed games or opt for the fascinating world of Ancient Egypt!

Review: China River

The free slot game China River by developer Bally features a very minimalistic and naturalistic design, with details reminiscent of Chinese tradition. Don't miss the precious symbol of the Blue Bird of Happiness and try to catch it! The mysterious symbols and music playing while the reels are in motion make for enjoyable games with good chances of winning. Read my review and try the free version at our online casinos.

What are the distinctive elements of this gameplay?

Bally's China River no-download slot features minimal gameplay with a background that shows leaves and flowers. With 5 reels, 4 rows, and 30 paylines, you can start winning! You can bet in this game from 1 cent up to 1 Euro. Press the SPIN button and see what fate has in store for you. As for the RTP, the game pays out 95.87%, which is acceptable, but remember that 2% will come from the Progressive Jackpots, so China River doesn't do it all by itself!

Symbols to discover...

The lowest symbols are the six Royals.
The highest paying symbols are: a Frog, a Gold Bowl, a Lotus Flower, and a ridiculous Chinese Character all dressed in gold. If you get 5, the game will reward you with 33.33 times your bet.
The symbol of the Yellow Bird is the Wild. It can land on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5 and replace any paying symbol. When it does, a beautiful animation depicting a boat on a river covered with a rain of flowers will start.
The symbols of the colored Coins in gold and red are the Scatters. If 3 to 5 land on the reels, they will give you from 8 to 15 free spins, plus a prize of up to 100 times your bet.

What are China River's 3 Jackpots?

This no-download slot has 3 progressive jackpots that must be won before they reach preset levels of 1,500, 20,000, or 200,000 credits. They are:

Minor,
Major
Epic.

It cannot be said for certain when they will be won, the process happens randomly and at any time. When a Jackpot is won, it is reset to an initial amount of about 25% of the amount paid. 2% of each bet is used to feed the three Jackpots and the process starts over.

What is the Mystery Stacked Reels feature?

Each reel contains positions of mystery symbols stacked that are replaced with one of two or three randomly chosen symbols when the spin is initiated. All mystery symbol positions on each individual reel are replaced by the same icon per spin except for the Wild.

My final conclusions

Like all the best Bally slots, China River is available to play for real money or in demo mode without any deposit. You will find the title in our casinos and on the occasion, you can take a look at other Asian-themed games or opt for the fascinating world of Ancient Egypt!

Review:
 
China River slot game overview

China River is a minimalistic and naturalistic design slot game developed by Bally. With 5 reels, 4 rows, and 30 paylines, you can start winning! You can bet from 1 cent up to 1 Euro and enjoy the game's RTP of 95.87%.

Gameplay features like the Mystery Stacked Reels

China River has a Mystery Stacked Reels feature. Each reel contains positions of mystery symbols stacked that are replaced with one of two or three randomly chosen symbols when the spin is initiated. The Wild symbol is not replaced by mystery symbols.

Paytable and highest paying symbols

There are six Royal symbols and the highest paying symbols are a Frog, a Gold Bowl, a Lotus Flower, and a Chinese Character dressed in gold. If you get 5, the game rewards you with 33.33 times your bet.

Wild and Scatter symbols and their functions

The Yellow Bird is the Wild symbol that lands on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5, and it replaces any paying symbol. The Colored Coins in gold and red are the Scatter symbols. If you get 3 to 5 on the reels, you get 8 to 15 free spins and up to 100 times your bet as a prize.

Progressive jackpots and their contribution to the RTP

China River has 3 progressive jackpots that must be won before they reach preset levels of 1,500, 20,000, or 200,000 credits. The Jackpots are called Minor, Major, and Epic. The current amount of each Jackpot is displayed above the reels. When a Jackpot is won, it is reset to an initial amount of about 25% of the amount paid. 2% of each bet is used to feed the three jackpots, and this contributes to the game's RTP of 95.87%.

Symbols to discover...

The symbols of the colored Coins in gold and red are the Scatters. If 3 to 5 land on the reels, they will give you from 8 to 15 free spins, plus a prize of up to 100 times your bet.

What are China River's 3 Jackpots?

Minor,
Major
Epic.

It cannot be said for certain when they will be won, the process happens randomly and at any time. When a Jackpot is won, it is reset to an initial amount of about 25% of the amount paid. 2% of each bet is used to feed the three Jackpots and the process starts over.

What is the Mystery Stacked Reels feature?

Each reel contains positions of mystery symbols stacked that are replaced with one of two or three randomly chosen symbols when the spin is initiated. All mystery symbol positions on each individual reel are replaced by the same icon per spin except for the Wild.

My final conclusions
